☊ Podcast: Supergirl TV Talk Bonus: Sterling Gates Returns!

18 Mar 2016
Podcasts Supergirl TV Talk

DC Comics’ Sterling Gates is back on the podcast to discuss his new The Adventures of Supergirl digital-first comic which ties into the TV series.

Support Sterling by reading The Adventures of Supergirl on Comixology!
